companyName: Dreyfus Alcentra Global Credit Income 2024 Target Term Fund Inc.
description: The Fund’s investment objectives are to seek high current income and to return at least $9.835 per Common Share (the public offering price per Common Share (as defined below) after deducting a sales load of $0.165 per Common Share but before deducting offering costs of $0.02 per Common Share (“Original NAV”)) to holders of record of Common Shares on or about December 1, 2024 (the “Termination Date”) (subject to certain extensions described herein).
